_sText:
***********************************
Counter-Strike: Source
***********************************
TITLE: CSS map - Mafia map
AUTHOR: Sota Poika
E-MAIL: omg91@hotmail.com.com
WEBSITE: -

FILENAME: mafia.bsp
FILESIZE: 5.28 mb
DATE RELEASED: 7 january 2006

CREDITS: 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 9 storys of stairs. be sure to use the texture lock when moving then in place.

Enjoy,
-cdxx
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
AKG for those door prefabs.. :)


INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: Extract cstrike -folder to X:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\<Your Steam Account>\counter-strike source (Where the "X" is your drive)

DESCRIPTION: It's a "slum" kind of map where are two apartments with 5 floors..One of apartments is CT's and another T's.. Map supports 20 -players(10 CT's, 10 T's)..

BUGS: 

-I don't know why but the ceiling lamp -models in rooms won't show.. So you know  now why there's light but no models and if anyone know how to fix that please tell me..

-Game lags little bit if you play with 15 bots..(My system specs: Pentium4 (2.93GHz), 512 RAM, GeForce 6600FX 256mb, 160Gb HardDrive)

COMMENTS: 

-It would be nice if someone Creates online -server with this map.. It's boring to play with bots(eh.. they are stupid)

-Also comment this map, please.
